benefits.name: Ability Score Increase
effects: Increase your Intelligence score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

benefits.name: Lore Knowledge
effects: Choose one of the following skills: Arcana, History, Investigation, Nature, or Religion. If you lack proficiency in the chosen skill, you gain proficiency in it, and if you already have proficiency in it, you gain Expertise in it.

benefits.name: Quick Study
effects: You can take the Study action as a Bonus Action.
